name: A Beginner's Guide to Transfiguration
effect:
Provides: 1T
You may use an action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

name: Alihotsy Draught
effect: Do 6 damage to your opponent or choose 1 of his or her items in play and discard it.

name: Barn Owl
effect: When you play this card, you may discard 1 of your CoMC lessons from play to put a creature card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Beater Grabs the Snitch
effect: Return a match in play to its owner's hand.

name: Beetle Eyes
effect: When you play this card, do 4 damage to your opponent. You may use an action to discard this and Eel Eyes from play to search your deck. You may take a Bulgeye Potion card from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Biased Commentary
effect: The next time this turn you play a spell card that needs Quidditch power, if that card does damage to your opponent, it does 5 more damage.

name: Bludger in the Stands
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any items in play, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.

name: Blue Wig
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then draw a card.

name: Bluebottle Broom
effect:
Provides: 1Q
You may use an action to put a non-Healing card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck. If you play this card, and you already have a broom in play, discard the old one.

name: Bulgeye Potion
effect: You may use an action and discard this card from play to do 13 damage to your opponent.

name: Butterfly Weed Balm
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions lessons from play. Shuffle up to 9 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Cancelled Practice
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Quidditch lessons in play and discard it.

name: Care of Magical Creatures
effect: Provides: 1F

name: Cauldron Shop
effect: When you play this card, discard any other location from play (yours or your opponent's). Either player may use an action to search his or her deck. That player may take an item card from his or her deck that needs Potions power, show it to his or her opponent and put it into his or her hand. Then the player shuffles his or her deck.

name: Charms
effect: Provides: 1C

name: Christmas Feast
effect: Put up to 4 non-Healing item cards from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Colloshoo
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any item cards there, choose 1 of them and discard it.

name: Colour-Changing Ink
effect: You may use an action to count the cards in your hand. Put them all on the bottom of your deck (in any order), and then draw that many cards.

name: Dog Biscuits
effect: Remove all damage counters (if any) from 1 of your Creatures in play. Then draw a card.

name: Draco Malfoy, Slytherin
effect: Once during each of your turns, when you use an action to play an item card, you get 1 more action that turn.

name: Dragon-Hide Gloves
effect: Whenever a creature does damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

name: Eel Eyes
effect: When you play this card, look at your opponent's hand. You may use an action to discard this and Beetle Eyes from play to search your deck. You may take a Bulgeye Potion card from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Eeylops Owl Emporium
effect: When you play this card, discard any other location from play (yours or your opponent's). Each Owl has 1 more health. Whenever an Owl does damage, it does 1 more damage.

name: Fantastic Beasts & Where to Find Them
effect:
Provides: 1F
You may use an action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

name: Flipendo
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent or to a creature of your choice.

name: Flourish and Blotts
effect: When you play this card, discard any other location from play (yours or your opponent's). Either player may use an action and discard 2 of his or her lessons from play to draw 5 cards.

name: Freeze!
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures in play and do 4 damage to it.

name: Frog-Spawn
effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to your creatures.

name: Good Night's Sleep
effect: Choose 1 of your characters in play that has a "once per game" ability you have already used. Use that ability.

name: Gringotts
effect: When you play this card, discard an other location from play (yours or your opponent's). Each player gets 1 more Action on each of his or her turns (including the turn you play this card).

name: Gringotts Vault Key
effect: Search your deck. You may take any card from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Griphook
effect: Once per game, you may make your opponent discard his or her hand. Then your opponent draws as many cards as he or she discarded in this way.

name: Gryffindor Match
effect:
To Win: Do 12 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
Prize: The winner gets 2 more actions during his or her next turn.

name: Hagrid's Umbrella
effect: You may use an action and discard this card from play to search your deck. You make take a location card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.

name: Hagrid, Keeper of Keys
effect: You may use an action to search your deck. You may take a location card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Hebridean Black Dragon
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your CoMC lessons from play.

name: Hedwig
effect: When you play this card, you may put a non-Healing card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Hermione, Top Student
effect: Once per game, you may search your deck. You may take up to 2 lesson cards from your deck, show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Injured
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. Discard all cards from it that need Quidditch power.

name: Lapifors
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures in play and discard it. Then search your deck. You may take a creature card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Lee Jordan
effect: You may use an action to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all of those cards that need Quidditch power into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck (in any order).

name: Letters From No One
effect:
Effect: Your opponent may only use actions to draw cards.
To Solve: Your opponent discards 5 cards from his or her hand.
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may draw two cards.

name: Madam Irma Pince
effect: You may use an action to put a book card from your discard pile into your hand. (Lesson cards aren't books.)

name: Madam Malkin's Robes
effect: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's). Whenever a card (yours or your opponent's) does damage, it does 1 less damage.

name: Magical Drafts and Potions
effect:
Provides: 1P
You may use an action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

name: Mid-air Collision
effect: Do 10 damage to your opponent. Then choose 1 of your cards in play (other than your starting character) and discard it.

name: Moonseed Poison
effect: When you play this card, do 3 damage to your opponent. You may use an action and discard this card from play to do 6 damage to your opponent.

name: Picking on Neville
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting character) and discard it. Your opponent may prevent this by choosing 2 of his or her cards in play (other than his or her starting character) and discarding them.

name: Pigley Dudley
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's creatures or characters in play (other than his or her starting character) and put it on top of his or her deck.

name: Porcupine Robe
effect: At the end of each of your opponent's turns, do 1 damage to each creature that did damage to you that turn.

name: Potions
effect: Provides: 1P

name: Practical Joke
effect: Count the number of items in play (yours and your opponent's). Do that much damage to your opponent.

name: Professor Quirinus Quirrell
effect: Once per game, you may return all Creatures and Items to their owners' hands.

name: Quality Quidditch Supplies
effect: When you play this card, discard any other location from play (yours or your opponent's). Either player may use an action to search his or her deck. That player may take an item card from his or her deck that needs Quidditch power, show it to his or her opponent and put it into his or her hand. Then the player shuffles his or her deck.

name: Quick Thinking
effect: Do 3 damage to your opponent or draw 3 cards.

name: Quidditch
effect: Provides: 1Q

name: Quidditch Through the Ages
effect:
Provides: 1Q
You may use an action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

name: River Troll
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your CoMC lessons from play.

name: Screech Owl
effect: When you play this card, you may put a lesson card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Self-Stirring Cauldron
effect:
Provides: 4P
To play this card, discard 2 of your Potion lessons from play. You get 1 more action the turn you play this card.

name: Silver Unicorn Horn
effect: When you play this card, put up to 2 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck (in any order). You may use an Action and discard this card from play to shuffle up to 6 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Sloth Grip
effect: During your opponent's next turn, you may prevent all but the first 3 damage done to you.

name: Spiral Dive
effect: Discard any number of cards from your hand. Do that much damage to your opponent.

name: Spongify
effect: Choose a non-Healing item in play and return it to its owner's hand. Then draw a card.

name: Swelling Potion
effect: Do 5 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use actions to play item cards.

name: Table Trouble
effect: Discard all items from play (yours and your opponent's).

name: Tawny Owl
effect: When you play this card, you may put a non-Healing item card from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Teacup to Rat
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's items in play and discard it. Then draw a card.

name: The Famous Harry Potter
effect: Before each of your turns, if there are 4 or fewer cards in your hand, you may draw a card.

name: The Leaky Cauldron
effect: When you play this card, discard any other location from play (yours or your opponent's). Whenever either player plays a character card, he or she uses up 1 action to play it instead of 2.

name: The Standard Book of Spells (Grade 1)
effect:
Provides: 1C
You may use an action and discard this card from play to draw 3 cards.

name: Three-Month-Long Match
effect:
To Win: Do 30 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
Prize: The winner does 15 damage to his or her opponent.

name: Through the Arch
effect:
29
Effect: Your opponent can't play spell cards.
To Solve: Your opponent skips a total of 4 actions. (Those action don't need to be one right after the other.)
Opponent's Reward: Your opponent may put an item card from his or her discard pile into his or her hand.

name: Transfiguration
effect: Provides: 1T

name: Vanishing Referee
effect: Choose a non-Healing character in play (other than a starting character) and shuffle it into its owner's deck.

name: Verdillious
effect: Do 5 damage to your opponent or to a creature of your choice.

name: Wand Shop
effect: When you play this card, discard any other location from play (yours or your opponent's). All Charms lessons (yours and your opponent's) provide two Charms power instead of one.

name: Wild Boar
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your CoMC lessons from play.
